articles.title: 'I am appalled': Billie Eilish apologizes for mouthing racial slur in resurfaced video - CBC.ca
articles.description: Billie Eilish has apologized after a video surfaced appearing to show the American singer mouthing a racial slur and putting on accents.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pakistan won’t host American bases as it may lead to ‘revenge attacks’: Imran Khan - The Indian Express
articles.description: 'We simply cannot afford this. We have already paid too heavy a price,” Imran Khan said, amid reports that the US continues to focus on Pakistan for a military base in the region.
articles.content: Prime Minister Imran Khan has ruled out hosting American bases in Pakistan for military action inside war-torn Afghanistan, fearing it might lead to his country being ‘targeted in revenge attacks’ by… [+4227 chars]
